name: Monkey Swing
description:
"Monkey Swing"  is a platformer level based game where your goal is to escape using your grapple. 

How to play:

1. Choose the location: Use your mouse to choose where you want to place your rope. 

2. Place the rope:  Left click to place the rope. 

3. Remove the rope: Left click again to remove the rope

4. Repeat 1-3 until you escape

Controls:

  • Esc to pause
